timeline.bodyText: GitHub Actions: 'advanceTo' is defined but never used
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

timeline.bodyText: GitHub Actions: 'By' is defined but never used
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to have a parameter for this and not just always set showExistingQuestionsFromCourse to true considering the other values are not parameterized too?
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

replies.bodyText: The same function is used to set showExistingQuestionsFromCourse to false when user clicks "from a file" button at the html file. And making it toggle like this.showExistingQuestionsFromCourse = !this.showExistingQuestionsFromCourse; would lead to irregular behavior for default selection, when user clicks add existing question.
replies.author: iozbeyli

replies.bodyText: Applying your suggestion, shouldnt it then be "Kurzer Fragen Titel" or even "kurzer Fragentitel" (Fragen-Titel)? (It's still Title - should at least be Titel)
replies.author: FuchsDominik

replies.bodyText:
Yes, maybe the English version can be changed as well. I actually did not change the existing ones, I just moved them to translation files. I've tried to add missing German translations but  my German is not so good.

Applying your suggestion, shouldnt it then be "Kurzer Fragen Titel" or even "kurzer Fragentitel" (Fragen-Titel)? (It's still Title - should at least be Titel)

I committed the previous suggestion but should I change it again?
replies.author: iozbeyli
